https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wTrPg4l1TMzpDTwNpRAltmKBFSQ.jpg Different Directions is the live recording of Champion's final show, recorded on May 27th, 2006. Released as a two disc CD/DVD set, which included a 6 camera angle video production & 24 track mixed and mastered audio CD. Champion: Different Directions (The Last Show)
